name: Nature`s Secrets Peppermint Face Wash
description: Be pimple and acne free! A cooling, delightful wash, rich in Peppermint Oil, Nut-grass, Myrobalan and acne-ridding ingredients to help you say goodbye to acne and pimples.Skin friendly at pH 5.5-6.0 and 100% soap free. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
